comments: He is very knowledgeable but his labs are the most useless and have no connection with the class-only to Nebraska.I\'m not sure if he does this on purpose, but there were a few times he had to be corrected in class.The class was extremely boring and wound up taking the class at a better place.
A fabulous teacher. Expectations are high for this class--biology isn\'t easy.
Study hard guys! Don\'t blame your teacher all the time. Look at yourself, have you done the best? For me, he\'s a great professor !
Condescending, doesn\'t allow you to question any of the information presented.
I thought he was an excellent teacher. I learned so much in his class and, although I had to study quite a lot, it was entirely possible to do well.
Very condescending. Chooses a few students from the class as favorites, unfair grading, unclear expectations for tests.
Best teacher on campus. Can explain calculus to a monkey. Hard class to do well in. He expects a lot from his students. Study very hard for exams.

Very knowledgeable about what he teaches, but thats not what makes a good professor. He chooses the few smartest students from class and babies them the entire semester. Extremely broad expectations on tests. Criticized my choice of pursuing a future in medicine, saying med schools will only accept people who "are actually interested in medicine."
